name: sensetype-ai
title: SenseType AI
description: AI-powered input engine that senses your intent and transforms your typing
author: thomas

commands.name: index
commands.title: SenseType AI
commands.subtitle: Transform your text
commands.description: AI-powered text transformation with real-time feedback

preferences.name: openrouterApiKey
preferences.title: OpenRouter API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenRouter API key for accessing AI models

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Model
preferences.description: The AI model to use for text transformation

preferences.name: customModel
preferences.title: Custom Model
preferences.description: Override model with a custom model ID (leave empty to use dropdown selection)

preferences.name: templates
preferences.title: Templates (JSON)
preferences.description: JSON array of templates: [{"name": "Name", "prompt": "..."}]. First template is default.
preferences.default: [{"name":"Improve Writing","prompt":"You are SenseType AI. Improve grammar, spelling, clarity, and punctuation. Maintain original meaning and tone. Return ONLY the improved text."},{"name":"Fix Grammar","prompt":"Fix grammar and spelling errors only. Return only the corrected text."},{"name":"Make Concise","prompt":"Make this text more concise while keeping the meaning. Return only the improved text."},{"name":"Make Formal","prompt":"Rewrite in a formal, professional tone. Return only the rewritten text."},{"name":"Make Casual","prompt":"Rewrite in a casual, friendly tone. Return only the rewritten text."},{"name":"Translate to English","prompt":"Translate the following text to English. Return only the translation."},{"name":"Translate to Chinese","prompt":"Translate the following text to Chinese. Return only the translation."}]

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
